text: Juan Carlos Bazalar Cruzado (born February 23, 1968) is a retired Peruvian footballer and current manager, who played as a defensive midfielder. He is currently in charge of Deportivo Garcilaso. He is also the father of footballer Alonso Bazalar. ==Club career== Bazalar developed as part of the youth system of Universitario de Deportes, and played his first professional game by Universitario to continue his development as a player. ==International career== Despite his age he was still periodically called up for Peru. He represented Peru in the 2007 Copa America. Bazalar has made 26 appearances for the Peru national football team.
